actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations.

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress regarding the sovereign rights of the United States in the Canal Zone.

summary.text: Declares it the sense of Congress that the sovereign rights of the United States in the Panama Canal Zone shall not be transferred, and that no Federal funds shall be made available for negotiation or implementation of any treaty or other agreement which may impair the sovereign rights of the United States in the Canal Zone.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress regarding the sovereign rights of the United States in the Canal Zone.
